name: 透
text: うぃんうぃんうぃんうぃん……

name: 小糸
text:
あ、あれ……
誰もいないね……？
trans:
H-Huh...
Seems like no one's in...?

name: 小糸
trans: We'll return the keys and leave...?

name: 透
text: ────うぃんうぃんうぃんうぃん……

name: 透＆小糸
text: か、カマキリの動きに音つけるの、怖いよ……！
trans: It's scarier when you put a sound to its movements...!

name: 透
text:
でも、暇だし
誰か来るまで
trans:
But, it's boring.
Waiting for someone to come in here.

name: 透
text:
……動いたっ
いけ、もっと右、右……ガシャーン……
trans:
...It moved.
Go, more to the right... right... claaash...

name: 小糸
text:
も、もうちょっと窓の近くに行ってくれたら
入れるのにな……
trans:
I-If only 
it moved a little closer to the windows...

name: 透
text:
置いてく？　鍵
ここに
trans:
Should we just leave them here? 
The keys.

name: 透
text: カマキリいるので、入れませんでしたって
trans:
"We couldn't get in because there was 
a praying mantis."

name: 透
text:
わかるわかる
ある？　書くもの────
trans:
They will, they will.
Got any? Something to write on────

name: 小糸
text:
……
さ、さっきより後退しちゃったね……
trans:
…
I-It moved further back than it was before, huh...

name: 透
text:
だって、めっちゃ構えてるし
うちらに
trans:
I mean, look, it's holding its stance.
Towards us.

name: 小糸
text: 『注意！　ここにレッスン室の』────
trans: "Notice! The keys to the lesson room"────

name: 透
text:
こらー、もうよしなさい……
君のお母さんは泣いているー……
trans:
C'mon, give up now...
Your mother is crying at home...

name: 透
text:
武器を下ろしなさい……
きみはよく頑張ったー……
trans:
Put down your weapon...
You've fought well...

name: 小糸
text: ……『カマキリが入り口にいたため』────

name: 透
text:
ここにいても何も解決しない……
おとなしく立ち退きなさーい……
trans:
Nothing will be resolved by being here...
Please turn back and retreat...

name: 小糸
text:
────
『ここに置いて帰ります。申し訳ありません』
trans:
────
"as there was a praying mantis at the door. 
We are sorry."

name: 透
text: 言ってやって、小糸ちゃんも
trans: Give it some words too, Koito-chan.

name: 小糸
text:
……！
え……！　き、聞いてるって言われても────

name: 透
text:
聞けー
これから小糸ちゃんが話すー……
trans:
Listen up.
Koito-chan's got some words for you now...

name: 透
text:
いけるいける
がつんと
trans:
C'mon, you can do this.
Firmly.

name: 透＆小糸
text:
……せっかくの夏なのに、
ここにいたら時間がもったい────
trans:
...Even though it's our summer break,
we're wasting our ti────

name: 小糸
text: ここにいたら時間がもったいないよ……！
trans: We're wasting our time here waiting for you...!

name: 透
text:
うん……
すごい、小糸ちゃん
